title: Wontons for Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) lean minced pork', '400g (14 oz) prawns - peeled, deveined, and coarsely chopped', '5 dried black or shiitake mushrooms, reconstituted in hot water and chopped', '3 spring onions, finely chopped', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '3 tablespoons dashi (dried fish flakes) (optional)', 'Packets of wonton wrappers']
